Title: Pontiac Bandit
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Norm Hiscock, Lakshmi Sundaram, Lesley Arfin (executive story editor), Gil Ozeri (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake convinces Rosa to make a deal with a criminal in order to catch a car thief, while Charles makes an awkward return to the precinct, and Holt tries to get rid of two puppies.
